response:
Right spastic hemiparesis with brisk reflexes/Upgoing plantar, right hemisensory loss and right limb ataxia together with an ipsilateral (left) complete, pupil-involving third-nerve palsy localise to a single left midbrain lesion involving the oculomotor fascicles with adjacent cerebral peduncle and tegmentum (red nucleus/SCP/medial lemniscus) – a Weber/Claude–Benedikt pattern.

lesion_locations = ["left midbrain"]
